description.value: Orks innately have the Traits Unnatural Toughness (x2) and Sturdy, and the Talents Iron Jaw and True Grit. Additionally, all Medicae Tests made to treat injuries of an Ork have +20 due to a Robust Physiology. Unnatural Toughness: Double Toughness Bonus (doesn't affect starting wounds), Sturdy: +20 to tests made to resist grappling and the Takedown Talent, Iron Jaw: When Stunned make Toughness Test to ignore it, True Grit: Halve Critical damage (round up)
